hackathon-description-text: Techie students! Shri Shankaracharya Group of Institutions invites you to participate in HACKATHON. You'll be challenged to 24 hours of hacking on challenges that are provided -- or anything you like! Hack in teams of three to five in order to be eligible to win prizes. It is one of the largest technical event in central India.
hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Junwani, Smriti Nagar, Bhilai, Chhattisgarh 490020, India
hackathon-location-address: Junwani, Smriti Nagar, Bhilai, Chhattisgarh 490020, India
